"You're doing great, you've come so far and overcome so many challenges. Keep going, you're stronger than you think."
"Take it easy, you've been working hard for a long time. Remember to take breaks and enjoy the little things in life."
"Don't worry, everything will work out in the end. Trust in yourself and your abilities."
"Be kind to yourself, you've made mistakes but that's okay. Learn from them and move forward with a positive attitude."
"You're not alone, you have people who care about you and want to help. Don't be afraid to ask for help when you need it."
